verbs.description: SINGAPORE ( AP ) — The tiny city - state of Singapore [V: is] hosting its largest media contingent ever for the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un . T

SINGAPORE ( AP ) — [ARG0: The tiny city - state of Singapore] is [V: hosting] [ARG1: its largest media contingent ever for the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] . T
